articles.title: WHO looks into reports of monkeypox virus in semen - Reuters.com
articles.description: The World Health Organisation is looking into reports that the monkeypox virus is present in the semen of patients, exploring the possibility that the disease could be sexually transmitted, a WHO official said on Wednesday.
